description:
The gag comedy follows the daily life of penguins, grizzly bears, and other animals at a cafe run by a polar bear.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Panda, part of generation cupcake, is prodded by his mother to get a job, but he just wants to eat bamboo. While avoiding his mother`s ire he happens upon a cafe run by Polar Bear, who just so happens to be looking for a part-time employee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Polar Bear`s Cafe
Shirokuma Cafe e Youkoso / Panda-kun no Shuushoku
しろくまカフェへようこそ / パンダくんの就職

REGULAR.description:
The patrons of Polar Bear’s Café have their own idea on the dream café, which starts to take form.   But when the cherry blossoms start to fall, thoughts turn to having a viewing party,
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone`s Cafe / Cafe`s Cherrry Blossom Viewing
Minna no Cafe / Cafe no Ohanami
みんなのカフェ / カフェのお花見

REGULAR.description:
Panda has convinced Polar Bear and Penguin to visit him at the zoo.  Being their first time, Polar Bear seems to want to go places he is strictly forbidden.  Back at the Café, the zoo workers discuss the pains of stereotypes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Polar Bear Goes to the Zoo / Panda`s Problems
Shirokuma-kun Doubutsuen e / Panda-kun no Nayami
シロクマくん動物園へ / パンダくんの悩み

REGULAR.description:
Penguin is excited about his new smartphone. But the café patrons are not impressed until Panda shows them his new phone.   Along with a new smartphone, Penguin is taking driving classes to get his license.  Polar Bear has agreed to give him a few pointers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Obsessed with Smartphones / Super Fun Driving Lesson
Smapho ni Muchuu / Wakuwaku Drive Lesson
スマフォに夢中 / わくわくドライブレッスン

REGULAR.description:
Full Time Panda is away for a week, so Panda has to work his shifts.  He gets some encouragement from a fan name Rin Rin, who he searches for every day.  Mr. Polar Bear wants to serve a special menu and when word gets around it will be Parfaits, everyone has a suggestion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda Gets Enthusiastic / Everyone`s Parfait
Panda-kun Harikiru / Minna no Parfait
パンダくん張り切る / みんなのパフェ

REGULAR.description:
After breaking the slide at work, Panda has decided to lose some weight.  His ideal body shape is far from his current look.   To fit his new look, Panda wants to be wilder but he admits he was born meek.  An invite from Polar Bear leads Panda to the bar, Grizzly’s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda-kun no Diet / Mezase! Wild Panda
Panda`s Diet / Strive for it! Wild Panda
パンダくんのダイエット / 目指せ!ワイルドパンダ

REGULAR.description:
Panda new obsession is with popularity, he attempts to raise Mr. Hanada’s popularity with the help of Polar Bear. Penguin finally got his license but now has to get his dating license before he can take Miss Penko out for a drive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Handa-san Kaizou Keikaku / Love Love Drive Daisakusen
Mr. Handa`s Remodeling Plan / The Great Love Love Driving Operation
半田さん改造計画 / ラブラブドライブ大作戦

REGULAR.description:
The Café is being featured in the magazine, Furafura Walker Monthly.  What should be a simple interview proves to be anything but thanks to Furafura unique editor in chief.  The Cafe is closed for the day so Polar Bear can get fresh ingredients.  A hungry and curious Panda joins Polar Bear and Grizzly Bear on their fishing trip.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Magazine Interview Comes By / Salmon Hunter: Mr. Grizzly
Zasshi Shuzai ga Yatte Kita / Sake Hunter: Grizzly-san
雑誌取材がやってきた / サケハンター・グリズリーさん

REGULAR.description:
Rin Rin the florist gets a truly random opportunity to visit the home of Panda, whom he adores.  But just meeting Panda Mama and Panda Sister might be too much for him.  Meanwhile, Mr. Penguin is getting pumped up to ask Miss Penko out on a date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rin Rin Deeply Moved! Panda`s House! / Mr. Penguin`s Proposal
Rin Rin Kangeki! Panda-kun Chi! / Penguin-san no Kokuhaku
リンリン感激!パンダくんち! / ペンギンさんの告白

REGULAR.description:
After eating Mr. Handa very plain lunch, Panda gets Mr. Handa invited on a group date in hopes his lunches improves.  But when the 3rd male drops out, Panda goes to the café to find a replacement.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Handa-san no Goukon? / Handa-san no Goukon!
Mr. Handa`s Group Blind Date? / Mr. Handa`s Group Blind Date!
半田さんの合コン? / 半田さんの合コン!

REGULAR.description:
While in the park, Mr. Penguin sees Miss Penko on a date. Grizzly stops by and tells Polar Bear it’s a guy’s 
night out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mr. Penguin`s Broken Heart / Panda`s Night Out
Penguin-san no Shitsuren / Panda-kun no Yoasobi
ペンギンさんの失恋 / パンダくんの夜遊び

REGULAR.description:
A rainy day at the zoo leads Panda and his fellow animals to think of creative ways to pass the time. Panda is still worried that Mr. Handa does not have a girlfriend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda, Tired of Boredom / Panda`s Advice Room for Troubles
Panda-kun, Hima ni Komaru / Panda no Nayami Soudan Shitsu
パンダくん, ヒマに困る / パンダの悩み相談室

REGULAR.description:
The patrons and staff of Polar Bear’s Café prep for Tanabata.  This is Panda’s first Tanabata and he is concerned about what to wish for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tanabata Decorations / Panda`s Wish
Tanabata Kazari / Panda-kun no Negai
七夕飾り / パンダくんの願い

REGULAR.description:
Panda and Polar bear decided to switch jobs for the day; it works out well for one of them. Afterwards Panda, Polar Bear, and Penguin decide to spend the day at the beach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enthusiastic Polar Bear / Let`s Go to the Beach!
Shirokuma-kun Harikiru / Umi ni Ikou!
シロクマくん張り切る / 海に行こう!

REGULAR.description:
The weeds have over grown the Café and Penguin seems to be the only person to care. Afterwards, Penguin finally confesses his love with great results!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Manatsu no Zassou Tori / Penguin-san no Romance
Weeding in the Summer / Mr. Penguin`s Romance
真夏の雑草取り / ペンギンさんのロマンス

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Grizzly hears some disturbing news about an old friend, and a stranger happens upon Polar Bear’s Café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grizzly-san Tabidatsu / Mishiranu Omise
Mr. Grizzly Goes On an Adventure / A Strange Restaurant
グリズリーさん旅立つ / 見知らぬお店

REGULAR.description:
Grizzly and Penguin work double duty while camping, and Rin Rin breaks a girl’s heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Camp ni Ikou! / Joshikousei to Rinrin
Let`s Go Camping! / Rin Rin and the High School Girl
キャンプに行こう! / 女子高生とリンリン

REGULAR.description:
The staff and regulars of the Café share ghost stores, and Panda doesn’t get the idea of running away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cafe no Kaidan / Panda-kun no Iede
The Cafe`s Ghost Stories / Panda Runs Away from Home
カフェの怪談 / パンダくんの家出

REGULAR.description:
A trip to the pool pits penguin against penguin, and the secret of Polar Bear’s coffee is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Penguin ni mo Iroiro Aru yo / Baisentte Nanda!?
There Are Many Kinds of Penguins / What Is Baisen!?
ペンギンにも色々あるよ / バイセンってナンダ!?

REGULAR.description:
Panda has decided it is time for him to move out and goes apartment searching with 
his butler, Mr. Penguin.   Polar Bear`s Café and Grizzly`s Bar are teaming up to 
run a food stall with a special gust, Panda’s “older brother” or something like that.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akogare no Hitorigurashi / Natsu no Omatsuri
The Ideal Single Living / Summer Festival
憧れの一人暮らし / 夏のお祭り

REGULAR.description:
With the Zoo Director’s permission, Panda has a change to try his paw in different zoo 
jobs.  Mei Mei finds the lover of her life, in the wrong person.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda Is No Longer a Panda / Mei Mei`s Prince
Panda-kun Panda Janakunaru / Mei Mei no Ouji-sama
パンダくんパンダじゃなくなる / メイメイの王子様

REGULAR.description:
The Penguins meet up to discuss ways to move their penguin species cards.  Mr.
Penguin comes to the café looking for answers to his Penko problem.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eigyou Penguin / Penguin-san no Picnic
Sales Penguin / Mr. Penguin Picnic
営業ペンギン / ペンギンさんのピクニック

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Handa invites Polar Bear out to lunch, while Panda and Penguin discover more about Sasako.   Panda Mama has much to learn when it comes to all-
you-can-stuff and all-you-can-eat situations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Handa-san no Soudan / Panda Mama no Nichijou
Mr. Handa`s Discussion / Panda Mama`s Daily Life
半田さんの相談 / パンダママの日常

REGULAR.description:
Panda is jealous of Masaki apprenticeship with Mr. Tree Kangaroo and is determined to find his own Master.  Sasako and Hanada are unexpectedly thrown in the neighborhood sports day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda-kun no Deshiiri / Doubutsu Darake no Undoukai
Panda`s Apprenticeship / A Sports Day Filled with Animals
パンダくんの弟子入り / 動物だらけの運動会

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Penguin art exhibit is disturbed by some uncultured guest.  Grizzly Bear shares his childhood memories of growing up with Polar Bear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mr. Penguin`s Hobbies / Their Childhood Days
Penguin-san no Shumi / Futari no Shounen Jidai
ペンギンさんの趣味 / 二人の少年時代

REGULAR.description:
Full time panda is scared of losing his job and MC 469MA brings the bar down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atarashii Panda / Grizzly Bar no Dousoukai
The New Panda / Reunion at the Grizzly Bar
新しいパンダ / グリズリーバーの同窓会

REGULAR.description:
Grizzly has sent a declaration of battle to the Café:  Wild Animals vs. Polar Bears
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Animal Field Baseball Part 1 / Animal Field Baseball Part 2
Animal Kusa Yakyuu: Zenpen / Jakuu Coffeette Nanda!? / Animal Kusa Yakyuu: Kouhen
アニマル草野球・前編 / ジャクーコーヒーってナンダ!? / アニマル草野球・後編

REGULAR.description:
Panda gives Polar Bear the day off and Full-Time Panda invites Rin Rin out for drinks and advice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda-kun no Owabi / Rin Rin, Manakareru
Panda`s Apology! / Rin Rin Welcomed!
パンダくんのおわび / リンリン, 招かれる

REGULAR.description:
Panda works his way up the ladder and Penguin dreams of flying.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda-kun no Atarashii Beit / Soratobu Penguin-san
Panda`s New Part-Time Job! / Mr. Penguin Goes Flying!
パンダくんの新しいバイト / 空飛ぶペンギンさん

REGULAR.description:
Polar Bear, Penguin, and Panda try their hand at trick and treating. Llama sits down with co-workers to discuss himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Halloween / Llama Day
Halloween! / Llama Day!
ハロウィーン / ラマデー

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Penguin has to make a choice of which Penko is right for him.  Panda Mama and Ms. King Penguin attend an idol concert!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mr. Penguin`s Dilemma! / Idol: Yama Arashi!
Penguin-san no Shuraba / Idol Yama Arashi
ペンギンさんの修羅場 / アイドル・ヤマアラシ

REGULAR.description:
Polar Bear gives his friends a tour of the café’s yard.  The Penguins meet up to discuss how to move more penguin cards.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cafe no Niwa / Eigyou Penguin no Eigyou
The Cafe Yard! / Sales Penguins` Sales!
カフェの庭 / 営業ペンギンの営業

REGULAR.description:
Panda is jealous of the Penguin Action Hero Show and asks his friends how get his popularity back.  Masaki taste the bitter truth of why you have to learn all the steps to roasting coffee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda Corner Contest! / Coffee Roaster Masaki
Panda Corner no Contest / Abuishi Masaki / Panda Corner no Kikaku
パンダコーナーのコンテスト / 焙煎士マサキ / パンダコーナーの企画

REGULAR.description:
Wolf has quit his job at the bakery and spends some time with his friend Tiger.   Mr. Penguin hasn’t been visiting the café recently; it seems he has found a new café…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ookami-kun no Tenshoku / Penguin-san no Atarashii Koi
Wolf`s Occupation Change / Mr. Penguin`s New Love!
オオカミくんの転職 / ペンギンさんの新しい恋

REGULAR.description:
Sloth gets a job, but what for? Lesser Panda and Polar Bear attempt to help Handa pick the perfect gift.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatarakitai Namakemono-kun / Handa-san no Present
Sloth Wants To Work! / Mr. Handa`s Present
働きたいナマケモノくん / 半田さんのプレゼント

REGULAR.description:
Grizzly and Polar Bear go shopping for the perfect pillow, but Polar Bear is not helping much. In the end, Grizzly doesn’t get much sleep.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grizlly-kun no Toumin Junbi / Grizzly-kun no Toumin
Grizzly`s Hibernation Preparations! / Grizzly`s Hibernation!
グリズリーくんの冬眠準備 / グリズリーくんの冬眠

REGULAR.description:
Panda is expecting a wealth of Christmas gifts, but the only one who seems to get him is Rin Rin, and Penguin just wants to party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Christmas Keikaku / Christmas Soudou
Christmas Planning! / Christmas Trouble!
クリスマス計画 / クリスマス騒動

REGULAR.description:
Its end of the year cleaning at the cafe and the New Year brings up reflection.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Cleaning at the Cafe / For Whom Does the Bell Toll
Cafe no Daisouji / Dare ga Tame ni Kane wa Naru?
カフェの大掃除 / 誰が為に鐘は鳴る?

REGULAR.description:
The café regulars display there not so hidden talents and while Polar Bear is on a New Year’s 
vacation, Penguin doesn’t know what to do without being at the café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doubutsu-tachi no Kakushigei Taikai / Shinnen no Okiaku-san
The Animals` Hidden Talent Competition! / New Year`s Guest
動物達のかくし芸大会 / 新年のお客さん

REGULAR.description:
Polar Bear tries to enjoy an evening in a Hammock.  Panda ruins his mother’s garden and tries to make up for it as best he can.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hammock no Umi / Panda Mama no Gardening
The Hammock Sea / Panda Mama`s Gardening
ハンモックの海 / パンダママのガーデニング

REGULAR.description:
The animals gather at the café for the traditional scattering of the beans.  Sasako and Llama share a quiet afternoon together reminiscing about their youth. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minna de Mame Maki / Gogo no Cafe
Scattering Beans With Everyone / The Cafe in the Afternoon
みんなで豆まき / 午後のカフェ

REGULAR.description:
The café patrons suggest different ways to cure Polar Bear’s insomnia.  Unable to sleep, Grizzly does some work around the café while Polar Bear shares a story from their youth. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Polar Bear`s Insomnia / Mr. Grizzly`s First Love
Shirokuma-kun no Fuminshou / Grizzly-san no Hatsukoi
シロクマくんの不眠症 / グリズリーさんの初恋

REGULAR.description:
Polar Bear gets a taste of what`s it’s like to be on the receiving end of puns.  Full-Time Panda and Llama have a wild night!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daja Cafe / Coffee no Oishisa no Himitsu / Joukin-san to Llama-san to Rin Rin
Pun Cafe! / Mr. Full-Time Panda, Mr. Llama, and Rin Rin!
ダジャカフェ / コーヒーのおいしさの秘密 / 常勤さんとラマさんとリンリン

REGULAR.description:
A major change at the zoo leaves one attraction a little bit lonelier.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Itsumo no Doubutsuen / Ame no Doubutsuen
The Everyday Zoo! / The Zoo in the Rain
いつもの動物園 / 雨の動物園

REGULAR.description:
Rin Rin and Mei help each other out in getting dates with their idols.  Polar Bear takes everybody smelt fishing with humorous results.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rin Rin and Mei Mei`s Super Exciting Plan / Smelt Fishing
Rin Rin to Mei Mei no Dokidoki Daisakusen / Wagasagizuri
リンリンとメイメイのドキドキ大作戦 / ワカサギ釣り

REGULAR.description:
The baby penguins set up for the traditional doll festival.  Polar Bear gets sick and it’s up to his friends to take care of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doll Festival / The Animal Doctor
Hinamatsuri / Doubutsu no Oisha-san
ひなまつり / 動物のお医者さん

REGULAR.description:
The Penguins get their chance to shine on the Yama Yama! Yama Arashi! Show!  Masaki wants his chance to roast coffee, but doesn’t get encouragement from everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nankyoku Sentai Penguinjaa / Madamada Abuitte Nanda!?
South Pole Squad Penguinger / Even More, What is Roasting!?
南極戦隊ペンギンジャー / まだまだ焙煎ってナンダ!?

REGULAR.description:
Sloth sets out for a hot spring, the café crew takes a trip around the world, and Mr. Hana is confused on what to get Sasako. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Namakemono-kun no Ryokou / Ningyou ni Natta / White Day
Sloth`s Trip / I Became a Doll / White Day
ナマケモノくんの旅行 / 人形になった / ホワイトデー

REGULAR.description:
Grizzly gets a surprise visit and the Café patrons go on a treasure hunt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grizzly-san no Saikai / Llama-san no Time Capsule
Mr. Grizzly`s Reunion / Mr. Llama`s Time Capsule
グリズリーさんの再会 / ラマさんのタイムカプセル

REGULAR.description:
Panda and Polar Bear team up to figure out some of Penguin’s secrets.  Everyone get 
together for a cherry blossom viewing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mr. Penguin`s Secret / Cherry Blossom Viewing in Spring
Penguin-san no Himitsu / Haru no Ohanami
ペンギンさんの秘密 / 春のお花見

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

titles.title: Shirokuma Cafe
Polar Bear Cafe
مقهى الدب القطبي
しろくまカフェ
白熊咖啡馆
백곰 카페
Polar Bear`s Cafe
